column1: Dementia is a loss of brain function that occurs with certain diseases.

Ask how you can: - Help the person stay calm and oriented - Make dressing and grooming easier - Talk to the person - Help with memory loss - Manage behavior and sleep problems Tips for reducing confusion in people with dementia include: - Have familiar objects and people around.
Calming music may reduce wandering and restlessness, ease anxiety, and improve sleep and behavior.

They include: - Adult protective services - Community resources - Local or state government departments of aging - Visiting nurses or aides - Volunteer services In some communities, dementia-related support groups may be available.
